mapper.select: select * from pub_dictionary order by pub_dictionary.sort;

select t.* from (select (@rownum := @rownum + 1) as rownum, pub_dictionary.* from pub_dictionary, (select @rownum := 0) r where pub_dictionary.status = 1
AND (pub_dictionary.type like "%"#{key}"%" or pub_dictionary.text like "%"#{key}"%" or pub_dictionary.desc like "%"#{key}"%")
order by updateTime desc) t
order by updateTime desc) t
where t.rownum > #{iDisplayStart} and t.rownum <= (#{iDisplayStart} + #{iDisplayLength})

SELECT count(*) FROM pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.Status = 1
AND (pub_dictionary.Type like "%"#{key}"%" or pub_dictionary.text like "%"#{key}"%" or pub_dictionary.Desc like "%"#{key}"%")
select pub_dictionary.* from pub_dictionary where id =#{id} and status=1
SELECT * FROM pub_dictionary where type = #{type} and `value` = #{value} and `status`=1
